title: Privacy at Scale: Introducing the PrivaSeer Corpus of Web Privacy Policies
abstract: arXiv:2004.11131v2 Announce Type: replace  Abstract: Organisations disclose their privacy practices by posting privacy policies on their website. Even though users often care about their digital privacy, they often don't read privacy policies since they require a significant investment in time and effort. Although natural language processing can help in privacy policy understanding, there has been a lack of large scale privacy policy corpora that could be used to analyse, understand, and simplify privacy policies. Thus, we create PrivaSeer, a corpus of over one million English language website privacy policies, which is significantly larger than any previously available corpus. We design a corpus creation pipeline which consists of crawling the web followed by filtering documents using language detection, document classification, duplicate and near-duplication removal, and content extraction. We investigate the composition of the corpus and show results from readability tests, document

translated_title: 隐私尺度：介绍PrivaSeer网页隐私政策语料库
translated_abstract: 组织通过在其网站上发布隐私政策来披露其隐私做法。虽然用户通常关心他们的数字隐私，但他们通常不阅读隐私政策，因为这需要大量时间和努力投资。尽管自然语言处理可以帮助理解隐私政策，但以往一直缺乏可用于分析、理解和简化隐私政策的大规模隐私政策语料库。因此，我们创建了PrivaSeer，这是一个包含一百万份英语网站隐私政策的语料库，明显大于以往任何可用的语料库。我们设计了一个语料库创建流程，包括爬取网页，然后使用语言检测、文档分类、重复和近似文档删除以及内容提取进行文档筛选。我们调查了语料库的组成，并展示了阅读能力测试和文档结果。
tldr: 该研究介绍了PrivaSeer网页隐私政策语料库，其中包含一百万份英语网站隐私政策，利用语言处理技术创建而成，填补了先前缺乏的大规模隐私政策语料库的空白。
en_tdlr: This study introduces the PrivaSeer corpus of web privacy policies, consisting of over one million English language website privacy policies, created using natural language processing techniques, filling the gap of lack of large scale privacy policy corpora previously.
